purpose_text.para: Indicates which memory partitioning and monitoring features are present on this MSC. MPAMF_IDR_s indicates the MPAM features accessed from the Secure MPAM feature page. MPAMF_IDR_ns indicates the MPAM features accessed from the Non-secure MPAM feature page.

attributes_text.para: MAMPF_IDR is 64-bit register when ARMv8.6-MPAM is implemented.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Maximum RIS value supported in MPAMCFG_PART_SEL. Must be 0b0000 if MPAMF_IDR.HAS_RIS == 0.
Reserved, RES0.
Reserved, RES0.
MPAMF_ESR is implemented.

field_value_description.para: MPAMF_ESR, MPAM_ECR and MPAM error handling are not implemented.
MPAMF_ESR, MPAM_ECR and MPAM error handling are implemented.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
MPAMF_ESR is 64 bits.

field_value_description.para: MPAMF_ESR is 32 bits.
MPAMF_ESR is 64 bits.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
MPAMF_IMPL_IDR defines no IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED resource monitors.

field_value_description.para: MPAMF_IMPL_IDR defines at least one IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED resource monitor.
MPAMF_IMPL_IDR does not define any IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED resource monitors.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
MPAMF_IMPL_IDR defines no IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED resource controls.

field_value_description.para: MPAMF_IMPL_IDR defines at least one IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED resource control.
MPAMF_IMPL_IDR does not define any IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED resource controls.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Reserved, RES0.
Has resource instance selector. Indicates that MPAMCFG_PART_SEL contains the RIS field that selects a resource instance to control.

field_value_description.para: MPAMCFG_PART_SEL does not implement the MPAMFCFG_PART_SEL.RIS field or multiple resource instance suport.
MPAMCFG_PART_SEL implements the MPAMFCFG_PART_SEL.RIS field and MPAM resource instance numbers up to and including MPAMF_IDR.RIS_MAX.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Has PARTID narrowing.

field_value_description.para: Does not have MPAMF_PARTID_NRW_IDR, MPAMCFG_INTPARTID or intPARTID mapping support.
Supports the MPAMF_PARTID_NRW_IDR, MPAMCFG_INTPARTID registers.

field_description.para: Has resource monitors. Indicates whether this MSC has MPAM resource monitors.

field_value_description.para: Does not support MPAM resource monitoring by groups or MPAMF_MSMON_IDR.
Supports resource monitoring by matching a combination of PARTID and PMG. See MPAMF_MSMON_IDR.

field_description.para: Has MPAMF_IMPL_IDR. Indicates whether this MSC has the implementation-specific MPAM features register, MPAMF_IMPL_IDR.

field_value_description.para: Does not have MPAMF_IMPL_IDR.
Has MPAMF_IMPL_IDR.

field_description.para: Extended MPAMF_IDR.

field_value_description.para: MPAMF_IDR has no defined bits in [63:32]. The register is effectively 32 bits.
MPAMF_IDR has bits defined in [63:32]. The register is 64-bits.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Has priority partitioning. Indicates whether this MSC implements MPAM priority partitioning and MPAMF_PRI_IDR.

field_value_description.para: Does not support priority partitioning or have MPAMF_PRI_IDR.
Has MPAMF_PRI_IDR.

field_description.para: Has memory bandwidth partitioning. Indicates whether this MSC implements MPAM memory bandwidth partitioning and MPAMF_MBW_IDR.

field_value_description.para: Does not support memory bandwidth partitioning or have MPAMF_MBW_IDR register.
Has MPAMF_MBW_IDR register.

field_description.para: Has cache portion partitioning. Indicates whether this MSC implements MPAM cache portion partitioning and MPAMF_CPOR_IDR.

field_value_description.para: Does not support cache portion partitioning or have MPAMF_CPOR_IDR or MPAMCFG_CPBM registers.
Has MPAMF_CPOR_IDR and MPAMCFG_CPBM registers.

field_description.para: Has cache capacity partitioning. Indicates whether this MSC implements MPAM cache capacity partitioning and the MPAMF_CCAP_IDR and MPAMCFG_CMAX registers.

field_value_description.para: Does not support cache capacity partitioning or have MPAMF_CCAP_IDR and MPAMCFG_CMAX registers.
Has MPAMF_CCAP_IDR and MPAMCFG_CMAX registers.

field_description.para: Maximum value of Non-secure PMG supported by this component.
Maximum value of Non-secure PARTID supported by this component.
Has PARTID narrowing.

field_value_description.para: Does not have MPAMF_PARTID_NRW_IDR, MPAMCFG_INTPARTID or intPARTID mapping support.
Supports the MPAMF_PARTID_NRW_IDR, MPAMCFG_INTPARTID registers.

field_description.para: Has resource monitors. Indicates whether this MSC has MPAM resource monitors.

field_value_description.para: Does not support MPAM resource monitoring by groups or MPAMF_MSMON_IDR.
Supports resource monitoring by matching a combination of PARTID and PMG. See MPAMF_MSMON_IDR.

field_description.para: Has MPAMF_IMPL_IDR. Indicates whether this MSC has the implementation-specific MPAM features register, MPAMF_IMPL_IDR.

field_value_description.para: Does not have MPAMF_IMPL_IDR.
Has MPAMF_IMPL_IDR.

field_description.para: Extended MPAMF_IDR.

field_value_description.para: MPAMF_IDR has no defined bits in [63:32]. The register is effectively 32 bits.
MPAMF_IDR has bits defined in [63:32]. The register is 64-bits.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Has priority partitioning. Indicates whether this MSC implements MPAM priority partitioning and MPAMF_PRI_IDR.

field_value_description.para: Does not support priority partitioning or have MPAMF_PRI_IDR.
Has MPAMF_PRI_IDR.

field_description.para: Has memory bandwidth partitioning. Indicates whether this MSC implements MPAM memory bandwidth partitioning and MPAMF_MBW_IDR.

field_value_description.para: Does not support memory bandwidth partitioning or have MPAMF_MBW_IDR register.
Has MPAMF_MBW_IDR register.

field_description.para: Has cache portion partitioning. Indicates whether this MSC implements MPAM cache portion partitioning and MPAMF_CPOR_IDR.

field_value_description.para: Does not support cache portion partitioning or have MPAMF_CPOR_IDR or MPAMCFG_CPBM registers.
Has MPAMF_CPOR_IDR and MPAMCFG_CPBM registers.

field_description.para: Has cache capacity partitioning. Indicates whether this MSC implements MPAM cache capacity partitioning and the MPAMF_CCAP_IDR and MPAMCFG_CMAX registers.

field_value_description.para: Does not support cache capacity partitioning or have MPAMF_CCAP_IDR and MPAMCFG_CMAX registers.
Has MPAMF_CCAP_IDR and MPAMCFG_CMAX registers.

field_description.para: Maximum value of Non-secure PMG supported by this component.
Maximum value of Non-secure PARTID supported by this component.

access_permission_text.para: This register is within the MPAM feature page memory frames. In a system that supports Secure and Non-secure memory maps, there must be both Secure and Non-secure MPAM feature pages.
MPAMF_IDR must be readable from the Non-secure and Secure MPAM feature pages.

MPAMF_IDR is permitted to have the same contents when read from either the Secure and Non-secure MPAM feature pages unless the register contents is different for Secure and Non-secure versions, when there must be separate registers in the Secure (MPAMF_IDR_s) and Non-secure (MPAMF_IDR_ns) MPAM feature pages.
